p: After RSV, human rhinovirus (HRV) was most commonly found. It was isolated in 27 samples, or nearly a quarter of the children (23.1%). HRV was isolated during the period from S52 to S13, although the maximum circulation phase was observed between S03 and S10. The highest positivity rate was recorded between weeks S04 (55.6%), S05 and S08 (50.0%) ( Fig.Â 6).
